video.title: How to Deploy a Dockerized Svelte App to Azure
video.description:
Learn how to create a production-ready Docker image with Svelte. Then we will use that Docker Image to push it to Azure Container Registry and we will Host it to Azure Container Instance.

Nginx: https://gist.github.com/scalablescripts/a69000659a0a09bb71066b9b4d3fcecb
